title: will my rank drop due to inavtivety if the season ends before the inactivety punishment
body: i recently got 0 lp in platinum 5 and i decided that i would not play ranked anymore this season out of fear of losing my rank. i got an inactivity warning that says i will lose rank if i don't play within 9 days but the season ends in 6 days. do i have to play ranked to get the ranked rewards or can i just wait the season out

replies.body: You'll have 28 days from your last match before decay takes place.  If your decay is **after **the end of the season then you should be okay.  Check out our [ranked play guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) for more info, but I hope that helps!
